body:
Comment 1: 
This is documented behavior. The Scan family of functions scan space-separated tokens.

from http://golang.org/pkg/fmt/

"Scan scans text read from standard input, storing successive space-separated values
into successive arguments."
"Scanln is similar to Scan, but stops scanning at a newline and after the final item
there must be a newline or EOF."

You might find the bufio.Scan functionality does what you want.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
